code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';import API from'../api';import{saveToken}from'../auth';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signup(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSignup=async()=>{try{const{data}=await API.post('/auth/signup',{name,email,password});saveToken(data.token);toast.success('Signup successful!');navigate('/');}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;toast.error(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.msg)||'Signup failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",style:{maxWidth:'500px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-3",children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success w-100",onClick:handleSignup,children:"Sign Up"})]});}export default Signup;
